page.title: 09ANNIVERSARY CONTINUED
page.content: {GOLDEN ANNIVERSARY OF C.P.SCHOOL(2). { }AFTER THE CONCERT MR.J.M.CHARLES UNVEILED THE PLAQUE AND THERE WAS A BUFFET FOR THE PARENTS AND EX-PUPILS.THE CONCERT WENT VERY WELL AND OVER TWO HUNDRED PEOPLE CAME.THE CONCERT FINISHED AROUND TEN O'CLOCK, THERE WAS ALSO AN EXHIBITION OF OLD PHOTOGRPHS BETWEEN THE 1920'S TO 1980'S.ALSO ON DISPLAY WERE OLD SCHOOL REGISTERS AND OLD WORK CARDS FROM THE 1950'S.THE PRESENT PUPILS HAD DRAWN SOME PICTURES OF THE SCHOOL AND IT'S EXTENSION. TO COMMEMORATE THE ANNIVERSARY EACH PRESENT PUPIL OF THE SCHOOL WERE PRESENTED WITH PERONALIZED MUGS.ALSO FOR SALE WERE COMMEMARATE PLATES AND A BOOKLET ON THE HISTORY OF THE SCHOOL WRITTEN BY MR.B.DAVIES AND PUBLISHED BY YSGOL EMRYS AP IWAN.
